content: the club shaped cloth crochet pattern is perfect for poker night casino fundraisers themed events or just anyone who loves games this pattern includes written instructions making it easy to follow along switch up the yarn weight to create coasters and decor in every scale for those who prefer visual guidance there are right and left-handed video tutorials with captions available the finished cloth is 7 5 tall x 8 75 wide be sure to check out the enter card suit set including the heart spade and diamond shaped cloths by moogly **materials needed-** hook 5mm us size 8 0 yarn **lily sugar n cream** https //amzn to/4bmvd3f worsted weight 45 yards
